articles.title: Ex-C.I.A. Engineer Convicted in Biggest Theft Ever of Agency Secrets - The New York Times
articles.description: The top federal prosecutor in Manhattan said Joshua Schulte had engaged in “one of the most brazen and damaging acts of espionage in American history.”
articles.content: The document dump a coup for the group but a serious blow to the C.I.A. included instructions for compromising various commonly used computer tools, and then using them to spy: the online calling ser… [+1201 chars]
